# Professional blurb

I'm a product professional who has specialised in solving for gaps in growing markets.

I'm now also a trusted adult educator, experiential learning designer, and vocational skills advocate.

I'm highly regarded for my breadth of skills, insights, and translation of ideas into hi- and low-tech ventures and products for persistent and emergent needs.

## Quote

"Ian is a deep thinker who is always one step ahead of the market. I have admired his remarkable ability to recognise global trends and predict where technology is headed. He demonstrates strong leadership skills and the ability to influence executives in a positive way. Best of all, Ian is a kind and fun person to be around."

— Karen Knott, General Manager - Corporate Communications, Fisher & Paykel Healthcare
